record.field: The following contract extra data should be set on the product: %(product)s.
Invalid value for key %(key)s in field %(field)s of %(name)s.
Expected key %(key)s to be set in field %(field)s of %(name)s.
Too many recursion levels in sub data definition.
Data %(sub_data)s is missing from the configuration.
Data %(data)s has multiple parents with the current configuration.
Subscribe by package is only available on quote
The return value of the rule must be a dictionnary.
The forcing of extra datas %(diff)s for option %(option)s must be done for all packages that include this option.
The forcing of extra datas %(diff)s must be done for all packages.
